text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet vs-encounter-type

  • Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-care-setting
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    outpatientOutpatientHealthcare services provided to patients who are not admitted to a hospital or other facility.
    inpatientInpatientHealthcare services provided to patients who are admitted to a hospital or other facility for at least one night.
    partial-hospitalizationPartial HospitalizationHealthcare services provided in a hospital or facility during the day, with patients returning home at night.

name: EncounterTypeVS
title: Encounter Type
description: ValueSet listing types of patient encounters based on hospitalization status.
